urls.title: What is a storm overflow and how do they work?
urls.description: Heard of a storm overflow but not sure what it is? Watch this to find out what they are, why they operate and what we do to minimise their impact on the wate...

text:
*Proud Agent alert*

Our creative team has been hard at work (as ever!) with @EnvAgency on a new animation. It explains what storm overflows are and how we can all do our bit to help the #environment.

Give it a watch here: 

https://t.co/V5mJgSle7D
